response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its worth to both myself and potential buyers, I propose a price of $11,000 for this exclusive item. This offer not only ensures a fair return on my investment but also provides you with an opportunity to acquire a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you require any further information or have any questions regarding the product or the offer. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 11000}
